nodes.text: The Emperor's Eye was an ancient Sith Temple on Ziost that fell into ruin by the time of the Cold War. The temple was dedicated to the Sith Emperor and contained an inscription left by his subjects, who awaited his return. By 3636 BBY the Galactic Solutions Industries conducted an archaeological reconstruction of the temple, using HR-02 Omni Droids. At the same time Vitiate, the former Sith Emperor, returned to Ziost and performed a ritual that wiped out all life on the planet, leaving holographic reconstruction of the temple unfinished.
Emperor's Eye was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan in game update 3.2.
